name: highrollersvault
description: The **PotCoin High Rollers Vault** is a decentralized raffle system that allows PotCoin (POT) holders to participate in exclusive NFT giveaways. By depositing a minimum of 100,000 POT into the High Rollers Vault (powered by the ERC-4626 vault standard), users are automatically entered into raffles where every PotCoin in the vault represents one chance to win.
